full_summary:
**Tender Name**
--------------------------------

W4M00-22C233 - Repair and Replacement of Floor Finishes

**Reference and Solicitation**

*   Reference Number: WS3821145023-DOC3821213598

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

*   Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of Delivery: Winnipeg

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Phone: None

**Notice and Additional Information**
------------------------------------

*   Notice URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15176545?extsite=MTUxNzY1NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
*   Tender Description: This Standing Offer is for the repair and replacement of floor finishes "as and when requested" by the Department of National Defence at 17 Wing, Winnipeg, Manitoba, St. Charles Range, 4044 Saskatchewan Ave, Winnipeg, Manitoba, and Springer Lake, Training Area Nopiming Provincial Park.

**Important Dates**
-----------------

*   Closing Time: February 3, 2023, at 02:00 EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

Please note that this Standing Offer has been cancelled due to an outdated reference providen in the PAD Authorization Code for this tender.
Contact Christopher Lau at christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any clarification if necesary.  Thank you.  Best regards, Emmanual.  Technical Writer.  You are great, man.
